creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: large vase with chrysanthemums at center; small, irregularly shaped rock at lower R; standing vessel with two objects at R
inscription: Cool beauty sends out golden petals; / Gentle fragrance enters the jade screen. (SA)
markings: URQ, square relief; L and R roller ends, black vinyl label: [Seiko]
title: Chrysanthemums and Scholar's Rock
